abstract: The chromosome number of 25 Australian species of the land snail family Camaenidae, including members of the genera Exilibadistes, Chloritobadistes, Cupedora, Meracomelon, Meridiolum, Glyptorhagada, Semotrachia, Sinumelon, Pleuroxia, Xanthomelon, Sphaerospira, Bentosites, Parglogenia, Torresitrachia, is n=29.
